title: Graduate Research Assistant
description: Designed and executed research projects in the field of cardiovascular fluid dynamics, culminating in a first-author publication on the application of 4D flow MRI for analysis of cardiovascular heart disease using pulse wave velocity measurements.

title: Sales Engineer
description: Manage high value opportunities and accounts in the custom packaging industry. This includes delivering proposals to target customers, planning and executing marketing campaigns, managing client and internal timelines / resources.

title: Design Engineering Intern
description: Developed process to measure dynamic clearance between automotive seat components, resulting in improved, and user-adopted, seat design analysis.

title: Student Success Center Senior Staff
description: Developed operations / training program for undergraduate tutoring process --- Mentored undergraduate students undergoing academic difficulty --- Created lesson plans for academic recovery course.

title: Engineering Intern
description: Designed and built fixtures and manifolds for valve testing --- Developed hardware and software (LabVIEW) for automated testing of standard products.
